attributes.action: promote an EU-wide aviation fuel tax to fund our fight against global warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The aviation industry is increasingly contributing to global warming but their kerosene is exempt from fuel duty. This is an anti-competitive  tax anomaly not least because it disadvantages land-based transport with respect to commercial flights. The new tax revenue should fund EU-wide projects to combat the serious and growing threat of global warming.
